title: Temperature Converter
subtitle: Easily convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.

usage.title: Science:
usage.description: Kelvin is used in physics for absolute temperatures.

usage.title: Weather:
usage.description: Fahrenheit is popular in the U.S., while Celsius dominates globally.

funFacts.title: Fahrenheit Origins:
funFacts.description: Named after Daniel Gabriel Fahrenheit in 1724.
